title: Config
description: A file that stores information on how each version of a resource should be built

directory.description: The directory in which the resource pack is located.

name_scheme.description: How each built pack should be named.

description.description: The description that is shown in-game.

block_files.description: A an array of files that describe all of the files that represent a block.

mc_versions.description: A array of Minecraft versions. Should go newest to oldest.

ignore.description: What texture folders should be ignored.

pack_format.description: The pack format. If left unset, it will be set based off of the Minecraft version.

minify_json.description: Should all json files located in the pack be striped of all indentation?

delete_empty_folders.description: Should all empty folders be removed?

patches.description: The patches that should be applied to the pack.
